remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其值或状态的单元格的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 当处理事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，在单元格中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`或单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 每当也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 你可以使用和属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，然后使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ##
